Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>! Didja come to see me? Man, I
feel so loved! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Hey, uh... I've got something I want to talk to
you about.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I'd rather not do it here. Let's go somewhere a
little more private. Follow me.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
See, lately, I've been thinking.
<PAGE>
Maybe me seeing that flier and moving here to
become a farmer all happened just so I could
meet you.
<PAGE>
I mean, you're a farmer too, and we hit it off
almost right away. Now we're even dating.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...Yeah, you know what? This has gotta be
destiny! Call me superstitious if you want, but I
really believe it!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I think you're The One...and if you feel the same
about me, then I really hope you'll agree to what
I'm about to ask you next.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>See, I love you a whole lot. More than anything
or anyone else in the whole wide world!
<PAGE>
And I want you to stay with me for the rest of
our lives.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>So, <MYNAME>... I want you to marry me!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can cook, and I'm great at chores 'round the
house. I swear I'm a better catch than any other
guy you could find!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Not only that, but I'm, uh...um... I'm... Okay, so
I can't think of anything else right now!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But that doesn't matter! You can't go wrong by
marrying me, I swear! So, um...please?
Yes, I'll marry you.
I need more time.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Y-you will? Seriously?! You aren't just teasing
me or anything, right? You really mean it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>WOO-HOOOO!!! <MYNAME>, we'll make the
happiest family ever, I just know it!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Okay, I hereby declare our goal as a couple is to
be the World's Greatest Lovey-Dovey Pair-of-
Mores!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>...Huh? What's a "paramour"?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Wh-whatever! Forget the little fiddly details. All
that matters is us being happy together!
Whoever's happiest wins!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>And I swear I'm gonna make you super happy!
Got it? Good! I love you, <MYNAME>, and don't
you forget it!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Okay! Now that that's done, let's go spread the
good news all 'round town!
<PAGE>
Heh heh. I have to show off my new bride to
everybody, y'know!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. So you two will be getting married?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>What wonderful news. Congratulations to both
of you.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congrats, you two!
<PAGE>
Still, you were the last person I thought would
get the jump on me, Fritz. I don't know how I
feel about this!
<PAGE>
But ever since you and <MYNAME> started
dating, you'd always swear up and down to me
that you two would be married someday.
<PAGE>
Now you've made that dream a reality, and that's
wonderful. Congratulations!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
H-hey! I told you to keep that a secret!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ha ha! You two are engaged now, right? There's
no need for secrets anymore!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL><MYNAME>, I'm sure you know how he is by
now. Stand by him and keep your eye on him,
okay?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I wish you both the best. Don't forget to invite
me to the wedding!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, yes. Speaking of wedding invitations, have
the two of you decided which wedding plan you
would like?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Nope, we haven't really thought about that part
yet.
<PAGE>
In fact, I don't think we know much about them
at all. Couldja give us the details?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Of course. I would be happy to explain. We have
three separate wedding plans available.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>There is the <BLUE>Simple Plan</BLUE>, which costs
<BLUE>100,000G</BLUE>. Then there is the slightly larger
<BLUE>Deluxe Plan</BLUE> for <BLUE>500,000G</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Or you could choose our most extravagant
option, the <BLUE>Luxury Plan</BLUE>, which will cost
<BLUE>1,000,000G</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
More extravagant plans allow you to invite more
guests, and present you with more options for
your wedding outfits and finery.
<PAGE>
In brief, as the names imply, the more expensive
the plan, the grander your wedding ceremony
will be.
<PAGE>
You may come to the guild at any time during
business hours and apply for the plan of your
choosing.
<PAGE>
So once you've made your decision, please
come to the <RED>guild counter during business hours</RED>
and submit your application.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Man, we've got a lot of different plans to pick
from! That's kinda exciting.
<PAGE>
It's not every day a guy gets married, so I'm
really tempted to make it a big bash...but my
wallet might not like that.
<PAGE>
I think I'll let you pick, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
No matter which plan you pick, it's still gonna
be our wedding ceremony, so that automatically
makes it the best ever. ♪
<PAGE>
I'm so excited, I'm shaking! This is a dream
come true...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Y-yeah... I guess that was kinda sudden, wasn't
it? Anybody would want time. It makes sense.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Okay. Think about it as long as you want! I'll
wait for as long as it takes.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Anyways, it's probably time for us to head back.
Lemme see you home.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, <MYNAME>. Did you come to see me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Well then, what say we make this an impromptu
date? I was just thinking I'd like to speak to you
about something.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Speak to you about what? Something very
important, actually.
<PAGE>
But I shouldn't say it here. Let's go somewhere
else. Follow me.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There is a thought that has been nagging at me
ever since our first date, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I couldn't help but wonder whether your feelings
for me were truly love...or simply admiration for
an older man.
<PAGE>
Every day, I feared you'd suddenly ask that
question yourself, and then promptly decide to
break up with me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But the longer we spent together, the more
confident I became that wasn't the case.
<PAGE>
Out of that confidence has come an ever-
growing desire.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>...I want to have you by my side
forever. I want you to be with me, and only me.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I...I want you to marry me, <MYNAME>.
Yes, I'll marry you.
I need more time.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Thank you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Once we marry, there may be more occasions
when our age gap becomes a concern. But I'll
make you so happy you won't mind.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I swear you will never regret choosing me.
Never. I love you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, what say we go deliver the happy
news to the rest of the town?
<PAGE>
We should make the guild our first stop. We
ought to ask Veronica how to go about
preparing for the ceremony.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. So you two will be getting married?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>What wonderful news. Congratulations, both of
you.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Now, if I remember correctly, there are a handful
of different wedding plans we can choose from,
yes?
<PAGE>
This is a first for me, so I would appreciate it if
you could explain them to us in detail.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Of course. I would be happy to explain. We have
three separate wedding plans available.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>There is the <BLUE>Simple Plan</BLUE>, which costs
<BLUE>100,000G</BLUE>. Then there is the slightly larger
<BLUE>Deluxe Plan</BLUE> for <BLUE>500,000G</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Or you could choose our most extravagant
option, the <BLUE>Luxury Plan</BLUE>, which will cost
<BLUE>1,000,000G</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
More extravagant plans allow you to invite more
guests, and present you with more options for
your wedding outfits and finery.
<PAGE>
In brief, as the names imply, the more expensive
the plan, the grander your wedding ceremony
will be.
<PAGE>
You may come to the guild at any time during
business hours and apply for the plan of your
choosing.
<PAGE>
So once you've made your decision, please
come to the <RED>guild counter during business hours</RED>
and submit your application.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I would have no problem if you
chose whichever plan you like best.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>We will only ever have this ceremony once, after
all. I don't want you having any regrets about it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Having you there by my side, that alone will
make this the greatest ceremony of my life.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But don't take too long making your decision, all
right? I am already looking forward to it.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah. I see. All right. I apologize for bringing this
up so suddenly.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I suppose my desire to keep you by my side has
spurred me ahead too quickly.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>This is a life-changing decision, after all. Take as
much time as you need to think it over.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, let me escort you home.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Perfect timing!
<PAGE>
I was just on my way to see you.
There's...something I want to talk to you about.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This...is not the best venue for it, however. Let's
go somewhere more private.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We've been dating for a long time, as you well
now.
<PAGE>
And, recently, I've been starting to think that it
would be positively lovely to have you there for
me all the time...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
By which I mean, all day. I'd like to have you
there next to me to say "good morning" when I
wake up...
<PAGE>
...and have you there at home, waiting for me
with a smile, when I get back late from closing
the restaurant.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Of course, if I get home first, then I'll be sure to
have the perfect dish for dinner cooked up and
waiting for you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>To me...that would be the happiest existence
possible.
<PAGE>
I want to live that life with you, <MYNAME>. So,
um...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...<MYNAME>... Will you marry me?
Yes, I'll marry you.
I need more time.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>You will?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...AHEM. Sorry. I've been so nervous about this,
I'd almost convinced myself you'd say no. So,
uh, that just kinda popped out.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I know I'm a little...overly giddy right now. But
you have no idea how happy I am. Or...perhaps
you do! Thank you, <MYNAME>...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I love you. I'll make you happy, I swear.
<PAGE>
So stand by me, won't you? I want to see your
smile every day, from now until eternity.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come, let's go share the happy news with the
rest of the town.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. So you two will be getting married?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>What wonderful news! Congratulations, both of
you.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey! What's the big idea, Raeger?! You never
warned me this was comin'!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Luckily enough, I happened to be here in the
guild office, so I overheard it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>You'd better not have been planning to keep me
in the dark about it, though!

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
No, no. I was going to tell you, of course.
<PAGE>
...Eventually. I figured you'd probably make a
ludicrously big deal out of it, so I was just
planning to...save you. For last.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hey! What was that?! I could've sworn I heard
something I wouldn't like come out o' that
mouth of yours!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...Well, whatever! Congrats to both of you. But
you'd better invite me to the wedding, or else!
You got it?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh yes. Speaking of wedding invitations, have
the two of you decided which wedding plan you
would like?

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Not yet, no. We were just getting to that part.
Could you give us some of the details on each
of the plans?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Of course. I would be happy to explain. We have
three separate wedding plans available.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>There is the <BLUE>Simple Plan</BLUE>, which costs
<BLUE>100,000G</BLUE>. Then there is the slightly larger
<BLUE>Deluxe Plan</BLUE> for <BLUE>500,000G</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Or you could choose our most extravagant
option, the <BLUE>Luxury Plan</BLUE>, which will cost
<BLUE>1,000,000G</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
More extravagant plans allow you to invite more
guests, and present you with more options for
your wedding outfits and finery.
<PAGE>
In brief, as the names imply, the more expensive
the plan, the grander your wedding ceremony
will be.
<PAGE>
You may come to the guild at any time during
business hours and apply for the plan of your
choosing.
<PAGE>
So once you've made your decision, please
come to the <RED>guild counter during business hours</RED>
and submit your application.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Just knowing that this ceremony is going to be
ours makes me plenty happy, <MYNAME>. I'm
okay with any of the three.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I'll let you pick, so you can choose the one that
will make you the happiest. No holding back on
my account, okay?
<PAGE>
Whew. I can't even put into words how much
I'm looking forward to this. I can't wait to hear
what date it'll be set for!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh. Well, this was rather sudden, I suppose. I
shouldn't expect an answer right away.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've put you in a tight spot, haven't I? I'm very
sorry. But these are my true feelings. Always
remember that.
<PAGE>
...At any rate, we should return home, I believe.
I'll see you back.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Have you come to visit little old me? Hee hee.
How kind of you!
<PAGE>
To be honest, I was just thinking about going to
visit you myself.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I have something very important that I'd like to
discuss with you, you see. But this isn't an
appropriate venue. Shall we go elsewhere?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
Allow me to get straight to the point.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL><MYNAME>, I wish for you to marry me.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You are a very attractive person. You are also an
open and friendly person...with everyone. Quick
to befriend any creature, large or small.
<PAGE>
Of course, that openness of yours is what led us
to meet, to become friends and -- eventually --
to begin dating as we have.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>However, I fear I will have to ask you to be
more open with one person in particular. 
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I am hesitant to make this request, but my heart
allows me no alternative.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I want you to marry me. To soothe my aching
heart. Will you allow yourself to become my
<MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
I know I'm being selfish in wanting you to be
mine, but...won't you please indulge me?
Yes, I'll marry you.
I need more time.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Thank you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
This was indeed partially a selfish request to
calm my nervousness...but more than that, I
wish for us to be a true family.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>After all, my family has been only my sister and
myself for all too long.
<PAGE>
I've always thought the two of us would build a
family that's as warm and pleasant as a
sunbeam...and I've always longed for it.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Er... My, how embarrassing! If you could, ah,
pass that off as a bit of nervous yammering, I'd
appreciate it.
<PAGE>
Anyway, thank you for accepting my proposal. I
promise that I will do all in my power to make
you happy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...For I love you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, then, we ought to bring the good news of
our marriage to my sister and the rest of the
town.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I simply must show off my adorable bride-to-be,
after all!
<PAGE>
...My, my. Your face has gotten awfully red. If
you're feeling embarrassed, there's a spot behind
my back for you to hide. Always.
<PAGE>
I would rather not let anyone else see how lovely
you look when you blush. That side of you...is
for me alone.
<PAGE>
...Now then, shall we be going?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. So you two will be getting married?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>What wonderful news! Congratulations, both of
you.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations! I couldn't be happier hearing
that two of my favorite people in the world are
getting married.
<PAGE>
Mistel, you be sure you make <MYNAME>
happy, okay?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Of course I will. I will make <MYNAME> the
happiest bride the world has ever seen.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, please take good care of my little
brother.
<PAGE>
I hope the two of you will build a wonderfully
happy family together.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Not that I need to tell you that, I'm sure. Oho ho
ho! I look forward to receiving my wedding
invitation.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh yes. Speaking of wedding invitations, have
the two of you decided which wedding plan you
would like?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Not yet. In fact, we were going to discuss that
next.
<PAGE>
Would you be kind enough to tell us the details
of what plans are available?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Of course. I would be happy to explain. We have
three separate wedding plans available.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>There is the <BLUE>Simple Plan</BLUE>, which costs
<BLUE>100,000G</BLUE>. Then there is the slightly larger
<BLUE>Deluxe Plan</BLUE> for <BLUE>500,000G</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Or you could choose our most extravagant
option, the <BLUE>Luxury Plan</BLUE>, which will cost
<BLUE>1,000,000G</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
More extravagant plans allow you to invite more
guests, and present you with more options for
your wedding outfits and finery.
<PAGE>
In brief, as the names imply, the more expensive
the plan, the grander your wedding ceremony
will be.
<PAGE>
You may come to the guild at any time during
business hours and apply for the plan of your
choosing.
<PAGE>
So once you've made your decision, please
come to the <RED>guild counter during business hours</RED>
and submit your application.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Personally, I do not like the idea of an overly
fancy wedding. However, if that's what you
wish, my love, then I shall readily concede!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>So please choose whichever one you like best.
<PAGE>
To me, the best plan is the one that will make
you the happiest.
<PAGE>
For no matter how fancy the ceremony, in the
end, it is you and I who will be the arbiters of
each other's happiness.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Hee hee. I can hardly wait for the day upon
which I can finally address you as my wife!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
All right. This was very sudden of me, I agree.
Please take your time and think it over.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
For now, it is perhaps best to head back. Would
you allow me the honor of seeing you home?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh. <MYNAME>. It's you.
<PAGE>
Perfect timing. We need to talk.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
It's not something I can bring up here, though.
Let's go somewhere else. Come with me.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. I'm sure you've noticed by now,
but I'm...not good at being all suave and saying
the right thing.
<PAGE>
So I'm just going to be blunt and tell you exactly
how I feel. Okay?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I don't mind having you around, smiling your
dopey smile at me all day.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Honestly, I feel kinda lost if I go a day without it!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>So I decided I want to keep you with me,
smiling that dumb smile forevermore.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE><MYNAME>... Will you marry me?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I want you to be a part of me, smiling like you
always do...but wider than ever before.
Yes, I'll marry you.
I need more time.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>...So...you said yes? I'm not just hearing things?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Whew! Thank goodness! I feel so much better
now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I've been thinking about this proposal thing so
much lately, it was starting to become like an
obsession.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>You have no idea how glad I am that I met you!
<PAGE>
I decided to hang around in this town for a while
almost on a whim, but I can't tell you how glad I
am to have made that choice now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I love you, <MYNAME>. I hope we stay together
forever!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
...Okay. I don't see the need to trudge all over
town telling everyone we're getting married, but
we should at least tell Veronica.
<PAGE>
After all, it's not like either of us know how this
town handles wedding ceremonies, right?
<PAGE>
There are supposed to be a handful of different
plans to choose from. Let's get some details
from Veronica.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. So you two will be getting married?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>What wonderful news! Congratulations, both of
you.

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Thanks!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>So, er, I hear this town has some different plans
people can choose from for their wedding.
<PAGE>
Could you tell us more about them?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Of course. I would be happy to explain. We have
three separate wedding plans available.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>There is the <BLUE>Simple Plan</BLUE>, which costs
<BLUE>100,000G</BLUE>. Then there is the slightly larger
<BLUE>Deluxe Plan</BLUE> for <BLUE>500,000G</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Or you could choose our most extravagant
option, the <BLUE>Luxury Plan</BLUE>, which will cost
<BLUE>1,000,000G</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
More extravagant plans allow you to invite more
guests, and present you with more options for
your wedding outfits and finery.
<PAGE>
In brief, as the names imply, the more expensive
the plan, the grander your wedding ceremony
will be.
<PAGE>
You may come to the guild at any time during
business hours and apply for the plan of your
choosing.
<PAGE>
So once you've made your decision, please
come to the <RED>guild counter during business hours</RED>
and submit your application.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm. I'm guessing you'll have more of a
preference here than I do...so you pick!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>If you tell me to, I'm warning you right now I'll
go straight for the Simple Plan. That's just how I
roll!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>This is going to be a once-in-a-lifetime memory,
though, especially for the blushing bride. So
pick whichever one will make you happiest.
<PAGE>
I'll wait as long as it takes, so feel free to take
your time and think it over.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>After all, this is our wedding. Just the fact that
it's happening at all is enough to make me
positively giddy!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>

<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>What wonderful news. Congratulations, both of

<PAGE>

<BLUE>1,000,000G</BLUE>.
<PAGE>

<PAGE>

the plan, the grander your wedding ceremony
will be.
<PAGE>

<PAGE>

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
